outline:
1. to dream
    1. (Qal)
      1. to dream (ordinary)
      2. to dream (prophetic)
      3. to dream (of false prophets)
    2. (Hiphil) to dream
  2. to be healthy, be strong
    1. (Qal) to be healthy
    2. (Hiphil) to restore to health
kjv_def: (cause to) dream(-er), be in good liking, recover.
strongs_def: properly, to bind firmly, i.e. (by implication) to be (causatively to make) plump; also (through the figurative sense of dumbness) to dream
